title: Mayim Bialik 🤦🏻‍♀️
description:
Mayim Bialik (Jeopardy, Blossom) and Justin talk about being a child actor and her breakout role in the 90s sitcom Blossom, how she didn’t really watch Jeopardy growing up and why she took a break from acting to get a doctorate in neuroscience.


Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App https://wondery.app.link/lifeisshort.


Please support us by supporting our sponsors!
